help:
Available commands:
- `!ping` - Shows bot latency.
- `!info` - Shows information about the bot.
- `!setprefix <prefix>` - Sets the prefix for commands.
 - `!setlanguage <language>`
helpPrompt: Use my /ajuda command to see everything I can do.
language_already_set: The language `${lang}`, which you entered, is already set on the server!
permissioncommand: You do not have permission to use this command. Only administrators can use it.

setlanguage.title: ğŸŒ Select the language you want to change
setlanguage.description: To change the current server language, click the button for the language you want to change below:
setlanguage.footerText: Click on the button corresponding to the desired language!
setlanguage.confirmationMessage: The server language has been set to English.
